domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @realDonaldTrump I applaud your advisors for pulling you out of the COVID-19 Task Force briefings. You were simply too big of a liability, detracting from the Task Force’s credibility.  They need people speaking who don’t say stupid, ignorant things. By the way, Happy Birthday to the First Lady.
